name: Align
comment:
Align forms to the horizontal or vertical lines of their bounding box.

Function names are chosen with the expectation that this module will imported
qualified, e.g. `Align.top`.

# Horizontal
@docs top, bottom, horizontal

# Vertical
@docs left, right, vertical

values.name: bottom
values.comment: Align forms with the bottommost form.

values.name: horizontal
values.comment:
Align forms horizontally, halfway between the uppermost and bottommost
 forms.

values.name: left
values.comment: Align forms with the leftmost form.

values.name: right
values.comment: Align forms with the rightmost form.

values.name: top
values.comment: Align forms with the uppermost form.

values.name: vertical
values.comment: Align forms vertically, halfway between the leftmost and rightmost forms.

name: Distribute
comment:
Distribute forms evenly within their bounding box, along a line, or on a
circle.

Function names are chosen with the expectation that this module will imported
qualified, e.g. `Distribute.top`.

# Linear
@docs horizontal, vertical, horizontalAlong, verticalAlong

# Radial
@docs radial, radialRotate

values.name: horizontal
values.comment:
Distribute forms with even horizontal spacing within the bounding box of
their centers.

values.name: horizontalAlong
values.comment: Distribute forms with even horizontal spacing along the given length.

values.name: radial
values.comment:
Distribute forms with even angular spacing around a centerpoint at a given
radius.
values.type: ( Float, Float ) -> Float -> List Form -> List Form

values.name: radialRotate
values.comment:
Distribute forms with even angular spacing around a centerpoint at a given
radius, and rotate them.
values.type: ( Float, Float ) -> Float -> List Form -> List Form

values.name: vertical
values.comment:
Distribute forms with even vertical spacing within the bounding box of their
centers.

values.name: verticalAlong
values.comment: Distribute forms with even vertical spacing along the given height.
